title: Advancing green space equity via policy change: A scoping review and research agenda
content:
Publication date: July 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 157

Author(s): Alessandro Rigolon, Rexford Osei Owusu, Marisol Becerra, Yuan (Daniel) Cheng, Jon Christensen, James J.T. Connolly, C.N.E. Corbin, Jason A. Douglas, Mariela Fernandez, Viniece Jennings, Jennifer Ito, Lauren E. Mullenbach, Lorien Nesbitt, Na'Taki Osborne Jelks, Rebecca Walker, Sandra Viera, Francisco Romero, Alberto Espiricueta
